titleStmt.title: The parable of the ten virgin's opened, or, Christ's coming as a bridegroom cleared up and improved from Matthew XXV, ver. 1,2,3 &c. / by Benjamin Stonham.
titleStmt.author: Stonham, Benjamin.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library (reel 826:13) and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York (reel 1214:2).
This item can be found at reels 826:13 and 1214:2.
